Name: Daily Demand Forecasting Orders
Abstract: The dataset was collected during 60 days, this is a real database of a brazilian logistics company.
RelevantInfo: The database was collected during 60 days, this is a real database of a Brazilian company of large logistics. Twelve predictive attributes and a target that is the total of orders for daily. treatment
